The Raptors shot 50 percent from the field and 51 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with the Raptors recording 31 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Magic committed 13 turnovers to just 32 assists . The Raptors also took care of the rebounding , winning that battle , 39 - 39 . The Magic ( 38 - 40 ) have now lost five - straight games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . Danny Green was the player of the game , as he tallied 29 points , five rebounds , two steals and three blocks off the bench . Kawhi Leonard was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 15 points , seven rebounds and five assists . The Raptors will look to keep rolling on Wednesday against the Detroit Pistons . The Magic ( 38 - 40 ) have now lost five - straight games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east .
